item.title: Seattle (Winter 2021)
item.description: 12.08.21 It’s an overcast day in the Bay, rare for any time of year. Fortuneately we’re heading to a place famous for it’s unrelenting cloud cover! Ha! We depart early morning from Palo Alto, headed for the San Jose airport. The flight is uneventful save for the descent - the plane shoots north past Seattle (did we get on the wrong flight? I don’t want to go to Canada), turning around eventually in a large arc before descending over the city into SeaTac.
